    Pixel Canvas

    Working at the pixel level in Sketch App.

    For my latest work on WeddingDJ, I’ve been designing in Sketch. One of my favourite features of Sketch is to go back on work and aligned it to the pixel grid. This feature, combined with Sketch Mirror, gives me assurance that my UI will not look fuzzy.

    If you’re using Sketch and you want to get your pixels back on the grid, use “Round to Nearest Pixel Edge” in the Edit menu.

    The location of “Round to Nearest Pixel Edge” in the Edit menu.
